Luculent Lollygag

Change Momentum

19 May 2022

It's difficult to start a pattern of constant change. Changing habits is the most important habit.

Once you do start that ball rolling, it's changes all the time. They feel great! Hold on to values rather than ideas or actions. Be sure your actions do reflect your values. Also re-evaluate values once in a while.
